messages.title: The NHS: Only safe with Labour
messages.content: "We only have the NHS because of Labour and it's Labour who have improved it massively in the last few years. I use the NHS quite a bit now. I know how strongly Jack supports the NHS and I am proud to be voting for him." - Patricia Wray, Stannington Resident

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's action shortened the recession. It's now to need to build Sheffield's strong resource-centric green-collar jobs and to support environmental manufacturing.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Sustaining investment in our public services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Labour has committed to maintaining investment in frontline public services, the NHS, schools and social care. Tories cuts would devastate these vital services.
Labour has radically transformed our constitution. Now we need to build on this continuing the work to ensure empowerment, trust, confidence and engagement.
Labour believes we all benefit from a fairer society. By eradicating child poverty, supporting the vulnerable with Sure Start, tackling climate change, we can make Britain better.

issues.environment: Maintaining green public services is one of the greenest cities.
issues.governance: Labour has radically transformed our constitution.
issues.health: Labour has invested in our public services, the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour has invested in giving our children the best possible start in life. We have made the right to paid maternity and paternity leave a reality for millions of families.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Sheffield all my adult life and I've seen so many improvements with Labour.

politicalExperience.achievements: Continued investments in public services, the NHS, schools, and social care. Striving to make Sheffield an even better place.

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Jack Scott for his strong support for the NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Sheffield is one of Europeâ€™s greenest cities. Labour has the commitment to maintaining green bins, which the Lib Dems want to scrap.
